survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from commuters about their experiences with public transportation services to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public transportation?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for easy selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public transportation?

questions.question_text: What modes of public transportation do you primarily use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select functionality. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox for multi-choice selection with an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What modes of public transportation do you primarily use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the cleanliness of public transportation vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the cleanliness of public transportation vehicles?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public transportation services?
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to provide open-ended feedback for qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text for free-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public transportation services?
